div.p: Empirical cumulative distribution functions (CDFs) of the global monthly spatial extent of severe drought for the period of 1976–2005 (360 months) in historical forcing and 2071–2100 (360 months) in RCP forcing under four emission scenarios: RCP2.6, RCP4.5, RCP6.0, and RCP8.5. The thin lines indicate the CDFs for individual GCMs and the thick lines indicate the CDFs for all GCMs for each scenario.
